[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [PhasedCommandHooks](./rush-lib.phasedcommandhooks.md)

## PhasedCommandHooks class

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Hooks into the execution process for phased commands

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PhasedCommandHooks 
```

</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Hook invoked to define environment variables for an operation. May be invoked by the runner to get the environment for the operation.


</td></tr>

**_(ALPHA)_** Hook invoked to create operations for execution. Use the context to distinguish between the initial run and phased runs.

AsyncParallelHook&lt;void&gt;

</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

SyncHook&lt;void&gt;


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Hook invoked after a run has finished and the command is watching for changes. May be used to display additional relevant data to the user. Only relevant when running in watch mode.


</td></tr>
